m_szDocSumamry: Honda Clarity fuel cell EV pricing announced (w/Images) January 25, 2016 | In: Honda/Acura , Images Leave a Comment Speaking at the Washington auto show, Honda executive vice president John Mendel said the Honda Clarity fuel cell powered sedan will cost about $60,000 and lease for “under $500 a month.” Actual numbers won’t be released until closer to the Clarity’s on sale date later this year. Unlike t he Toyota Mirai and Hyundai Tucson FCEV , the Clarity will be available for purchase. The others can only be leased.
